data: Lonny Higgens, once of the earthly planet, stretched out in the conning-tower of his mud-submarine, an aquatic monstrosity of globular reinforced steel that was at home either above or below the surface of the squirming mud seas of Uranus, and sighed lazily.
conning-tower | mud-submarine | mud seas of Uranus
Haggard, J. Harvey (John Harvey), 1912-2001; Forte, John R. (John Robert), 1918-1966 [Illustrator]
